direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve setting or updating a value in the map, though 'put' also checks for key equality.
Both methods involve updating a value, with 'updateEntry' being more specific to the internal structure of the map.
Both methods throw exceptions under certain conditions, though for different reasons (removal vs. invalid state).
Both methods affect the state of the map, though 'clear' removes all entries while 'setValue' updates a specific value.
Both methods involve modifying the map's contents, with 'putAll' adding multiple entries and 'setValue' updating a single value.
